comments.content:
Based on a traditional typeface (Jenson), but rather modern—Hightower Text by Tobias Frere-Jones for Font Bureau:  
 [http://www.fontbureau.com/fonts/Hightower/styles/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150221015956/http:/www.fontbureau.com/fonts/Hightower/styles/ "http://www.fontbureau.com/fonts/Hightower/styles/")
